githubToken.description: Your github access token, found here: https://github.com/settings/tokens

queries.description: The list of query configurations which drive what prs are displayed

query.description: The github search syntax query to use to retrieve the list of prs. Use `{githubUser}` as the wildcard for your github username. More information: https://docs.github.com/en/search-github/searching-on-github/searching-issues-and-pull-requests.

label.description: The label to associate with this query
The label to use for this action
label.actionKey: the action to run, correlates to the key in the [actions] section

method.description: The http method to use for this request

url.description: the url for this api request

refreshAfterExecute.description: Whether or not to refresh the list of prs after the action has been run

body.description: any body parameters for the api request

prTitleRewriter.description: A regex string that selects content in a pr title to remove. Can be useful to remove unhelpful information like a jira ticket, and cleanup the list of prs

windowHeight.description: The height of the popover window, in pixels. Requires app restart on change

queryInterval.description: The interval time to between re-runs of the currently active query. In "[number]hrs/min/sec"
